channel.title: Trailer Semi Flat Stepframe on Universal
channel.description: Recent content in Trailer Semi Flat Stepframe on Universal

item.title: E01657
item.description: Nooteboom OSD47VVS 3 axle low bed trailer, 60 ton gross weight, steel suspension, 8.50mtr low bed length, 1.80mtr extendable, 2.5mtr width, winch, 8.25R15 Bridgestone tyres with approx. 75% remaining.2

item.title: E01709
item.description: 2 axle step frame trailer, 31510 kgs gross weight, 12.05 mtr length, 8.80 mtr low bed length, wooden floor, 265⁄70-19.5 tyres with approx. 80% remaining. Trailer is in very good and clean condition.

item.title: E04994
item.description: New and Unused Alpsan SCP329 Semi-lowbed trailer, 3 Axles, 12 Ton axles, gross weight 54 Ton, length 14.2 Mtr, width 2.55 Mtr, load platform length 8.9 Mtr, air suspension, dual tyres, one lift axle, 275/70R22.5 tyres, electro-hydraulic ramps, EBS air brake system, side extensions (300mm), 50mm thickness hard wooden floor and steel covered over tyres, CE marked. Inspections are welcome.

item.title: E04995
item.description: New and Unused GT Extendable semi-lowbed trailer, 4 axles, 12 Ton axles, gross weight 71 Ton, length 14 Mtr + 6 Mtr extendable, width 2.55 Mtr, load platform length 10 Mtr, 3 hydraulic steering axles, one lift axle, air suspension, dual tyres, 2 hydraulic outriggers, 235/75R17.5 tyres, side extensions (300mm), twist locks for 2 x 20 ft / 1 x 40 ft container, 2 wide storage boxes underneath, EBS air brake system, CE marked.

item.title: E04996
item.description: New and Unused Scorpion SCP329 Semi-lowbed trailer, 3 Axles, 12 Ton axles, gross weight 54 Ton, length 14.2 Mtr, width 3.0 Mtr, load platform length 8.85 Mtr, steel suspension, dual tyres, one lift axle, 275/70R22.5 tyres, electro-hydraulic ramps, EBS air brake system, side extensions (300mm), 50mm thickness hard wooden floor and steel covered over tyres, CE marked. Inspections are welcome.
